NSNumber(DelimiterDisplay) Class Reference

Category for transforming a delimiter character value into a human-readable expression. More...

#import <NSNumber+DelimiterDisplay.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(NSString *) - delimiterDisplayName
 Returns a localized, human-readable expression of the receiver, with -shortValue interpreted as a unicode character, for a tag delimiter.

Detailed Description

Category for transforming a delimiter character value into a human-readable expression.

This category is referenced in bindings in Bookshelf.nib and PrefsWindow.nib.
